original: Veṇukātyāyanasagotrīsūtra
analyzed: veṇu kātyāyana sagotrī sūtra

original: Wal_1 pṛccha bhagini śrutvā te vedayiṣyāmi /
analyzed: pṛccha bhagini śrutvā te vedayiṣyāmi

original: Wal_2 saṁti śramaṇa eke śramaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ ye svayaṁkṛtaṁ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti / saṁty
analyzed: satya śramaṇa eke śramaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ ye svayakṛta sukhaduḥkha prajñapayati satya

original: eke parakṛtaṁ prajñapayaṁti saṁty eke svayaṁkṛtaṁ ca parakṛtaṁ ca / saṁty eke ’svayaṁkāra?aparakārahetusamutpannaṁ
analyzed: eke parakṛta prajñapayati sati eke svayakṛta ca parakṛta ca sati eke svayakāra aparakāra hetu samutpanna

original: sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti / yathā kathaṁ samutpannam arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti /
analyzed: sukha duḥkha prajñapayati yathā katha samutpannam arhantaḥ sukha duḥkha prajñapayati

original: Wal_3 anyathāsamutpannam arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti /
analyzed: anyathāsamutpannam arhantaḥ sukha duḥkha prajñapayati

original: Wal_4 yathā kathaṁ śramaṇa anyathāsamutpannam arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti /
analyzed: yathā katha śramaṇa anyathāsamutpannam arhantaḥ sukha duḥkha prajñapayati

original: Wal_5 pratītyasamutpannaṁ bhagini arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti /
analyzed: pratītyasamutpanna bhagini arhantaḥ sukha duḥkha prajñapayati

original: Wal_6 yathā kathaṁ śramaṇa pratītyasamutpannaṁ arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñpayaṁti /
analyzed: yathā katha śramaṇa pratītyasamutpanna arhantaḥ sukha duḥkha prajñpayati

original: Wal_7 tena hi bhagini tvām eva prakṣyāmi yathā te kṣamati tathaitaṁ vyākuru /
analyzed: tena hi bhagini tvām eva prakṣyāmi yathā te kṣamati tathā eta vyākuru

original: Wal_8 kiṁ manyase bhagini / asti cakṣuḥ / asti śramaṇa / asti rūpam / asti śramaṇa /
analyzed: ki manyase bhagini asti cakṣuḥ asti śramaṇa asti rūpam asti śramaṇa

original: Wal_9 cakṣuś ced bhagini utpadyeta api nu asti cakṣuḥsaṁsparśapratyayam ādhyātmam utpadyate vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā  #
analyzed: cakṣuḥ ced bhagini utpadyeta api nu asti cakṣuḥ sa sparśa pratyayam ādhyātmam utpadyate

original: / asti śramaṇa /
analyzed: asti śramaṇa

original: Wal_10 asti śrotram asti ghāṇam asti jihvā asti kāyaḥ asti manaḥ /
analyzed: asti śrotram asti ghāṇam asti jihvā asti kāyaḥ asti manaḥ

original: asti śramaṇa / saṁti dharmāḥ /
analyzed: asti śramaṇa sati dharmāḥ

original: Wal_11 asti śrotraṁ ghrāṇaṁ jihvā kāyo manaś ced utpadyeta api nu śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṁsparśapratyayam ādhyātmam utpadyate vedayitaṁ  #
analyzed: asti śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāyaḥ manaḥ ced utpadyeta api nu śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ sa sparśa pratyayam ādhyātmam utpadyate

original: sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā /
analyzed: sukha vā duḥkha vā aduḥkha asukha vā

original: asti śramaṇa /
analyzed: asti śramaṇa

original: Wal_12 evaṁ hi bhagini pratīyasamutpannam arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti /
analyzed: eva hi bhagini pratīya samutpannam arhantaḥ sukha duḥkha prajñapayati

original: Wal_13 evaṁ hi śramaṇa pratītyasamutpannam arhantaḥ sukhaṁ prajñapya yathā kathaṁ śramaṇa arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhasya nirodhaṁ prajñapayaṁti /
analyzed: eva hi śramaṇa pratītyasamutpannam arhantaḥ sukha prajñapya yathā katha śramaṇa arhantaḥ sukha duḥkhasya nirodha prajñapayati

original: Wal_14 tena hi bhagini tvām eva prakṣyāmi yathā te kṣamati tathaitaṁ vyākuru /
analyzed: tena hi bhagini tvām eva prakṣyāmi yathā te kṣamati tathā eta vyākuru

original: Wal_15 kiṁ manyase bhagini / cakṣuś ced bhagini sarveṇa sarvaṁ sarvathā apariśeṣaṁ nirudhyeta
analyzed: ki manyase bhagini cakṣuḥ ced bhagini sarveṇa sarva sarvathā nirudhyeta

original: apariśeṣan adhyastaṁ parikṣayam paryādānaṁ gacched api nu cakṣuḥsaṁsparśapratyayam
analyzed: a pariśeṣan adhyasta parikṣayam gacchet api nu cakṣuḥ sa sparśa pratyayam

original: ādhyātmam utpadyate vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā /
analyzed: ādhyātmam utpadyate vedayita sukha vā duḥkha vā aduḥkha asukha vā

original: no śramaṇa /
analyzed: no śramaṇa

original: Wal_16 śrotraṁ ghrāṇaṁ jihvā kāyo manaś ced bhagini sarveṇa sarvaṁ sarvathā apariśeṣaṁ nirudhyeta
analyzed: śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāyaḥ manaḥ ced bhagini sarveṇa sarva sarvathā nirudhyeta

original: apariśeṣam adhyastaṁ parikṣayaṁ paryādānaṁ gacchet api nu manaḥsaṁsparśapratyayam
analyzed: apariśeṣam adhyasta parikṣaya paryādāna gacchet api nu manaḥ sa sparśa pratyayam

original: ādhyātmam utpadyate vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā /
analyzed: ādhyātmam utpadyate vedayita sukha vā duḥkha vā aduḥkha asukha vā

original: no śramaṇa /
analyzed: no śramaṇa

original: Wal_17 evaṁ hi bhagini ārhantaḥ pratītyasamutpannasya sukhaduḥkhasya nirodhaṁ prajñapayaṁti /
analyzed: eva hi bhagini ārhantaḥ pratītyasamutpannasya sukha duḥkhasya nirodha prajñapayati

original: Wal_18 asmiṁ khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāne veṇukātyāyanasagotryā virajo vigatamalaṁ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam …
analyzed: asmi khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāne veṇukātyāyana sagotryā virajaḥ vigata mala dharmeṣu dharma cakṣuḥ utpannam

original: Wal_19 atha veṇukātyāyanasagotrī dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā
analyzed: atha veṇukātyāyana sagotrī dṛṣṭa dharmā prāpta dharmā vidita dharmā paryavagāḍha dharmā

original: tīrṇakāṁkṣā tīrṇavicikitsā aparapratyayā ananyaneyā śāstuḥ śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśaradyaprāptā
analyzed: tīrṇaka akṣā tīrṇa vicikitsā apara pratyayā ananya neyā śāstuḥ śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśaradya prāptā

original: utthāyāsanād ekāṁsam uttarāsaṁgaṁ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān udāyī tenāṁjaliṁ praṇamya āyuṣmantam
analyzed: utthāya āsanāt eka āsam uttarāsaga kṛtvā yena āyuṣmān udāyī tena ajali praṇamya āyuṣmantam

original: udāyinam idam avocat /
analyzed: udāyinam idam avocat

original: Wal_20 abhikrāntāhaṁ śramaṇa abhikrāntā eṣāhaṁ bhagavantaṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchāmi dharmaṁ ca bhikṣusaṁghaṁ
analyzed: abhikrāntā āha śramaṇa abhikrāntā eṣā āha bhagavanta śaraṇa gacchāmi dharma ca bhikṣu sagha

original: ca / upāsikāṁ ca mān dhāraya śramaṇa adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇopetaṁ śaraṇaṁgatām abhiprasannām /
analyzed: ca upāsikā ca mān dhāraya śramaṇa adya agreṇa yāvajjīva prāṇa upeta śaraṇa gatām abhiprasannām

original: Wal_21 atha udāyī veṇukātyāyanasagotrīṁ brāhmaṇīṁ dhārmyā kathayāsaṁdarśayitvā samādapayitvā samuttejayitvā saṁpraharṣayitvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ
analyzed: atha udāyī veṇukātyāyana sagotrī brāhmaṇī dhārmyā kathayā a sa darśayitvā samādapayitvā samuttejayitvā sa praharṣayitvā utthāya āsanāt prakrāntaḥ
